# quantity(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the voltage for the specified lead.

## Declaration

```swift
func quantity(for lead: HKElectrocardiogram.Lead) -> HKQuantity?
```

## Parameters

- **lead**: The lead whose voltage you want to read.

## Return Value

A quantity object containing a value in volt units. These values are compatible with any units created using [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/voltUnit(with:)].

## Accessing Data

- **timeSinceSampleStart**: The time of the measurement relative to the sample’s start time.
